content.rendered:
Interest of robotics is being build up in kids and higher age of students. Robotics basic is course to understand all concept of Robotics. Vmaxinfo Instituteprovide basic robotics training for group of students. Key features of this course are explain below.

  • Introduction to Robotics
  • Mechanics & Assembly
  • Gears and Gear Trains
  • Fundamentals of Electrical and
  • Electronic Circuit
  • Bread-boarding techniques
  • Circuit building and simulation
  • Use of semiconductors like
  • Diodes, Resistor, Capacitor , IC’s
  • etc.
  • Learn to use sensors
  • Sensor based robots
  • Soldering and GPB making
  • Radio Frequency (RF)
  • Technology
  • Wireless Robots
